Article: AmazonBasics AA Performance Alkaline Batteries (48 Count) - Packaging May Vary: Bulk is always the less expensive way to go for products like these. Worst product review: I order 3 of them and one of them is bad quality. Is missing backup spring so I have to put a pcs of aluminum to make the battery work.

Fire Kids Edition Tablet, 7 Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB, Pink Kid-Proof Case: great tablet for kids when traveling. Echo (White),,,: I love this product. Perfect size for travel. I take it everywhere. Great for watching videos as well.

Fire HD 8 Kids Edition Tablet, 8 HD Display, 32 GB, Pink Kid-Proof Case. Purchase was to replace Fire HD 8.9 that was left on a plane (found & return 50 days later). Like this smaller version due to size & it's 3 years newer on technology side.

All-New Kindle Oasis E-reader - 7 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi), Waterproof, Built-In Audible, 32 GB, Wi-Fi + Free Cellular Connectivity. The best Kindle ever, for me, is still the huge DX that Amazon used to make.

Amazon Fire TV with 4K Ultra HD and Alexa Voice Remote (Pendant Design) | Streaming Media Player: A lazy mans drean when it is combined with Alexa. AmazonBasics Nylon CD/DVD Binder (400 Capacity): Great case to keep everything in its place! My husband love it!!!! Holds a lot of cds!
